routine.name: insert_into_questions
routine.ArgumentsDefinition: body text, userid integer, title character varying, categoryid integer

routine.name: question_answers
routine.ResultsDefinition: TABLE(id integer, user_id integer, username character varying, body text, created_at timestamp without time zone)

routine.name: recent_questions
routine.ResultsDefinition: TABLE(publicationid integer, title character varying, body text, creation_date timestamp without time zone, solved_date timestamp without time zone, username character varying, userid integer, answers_count bigint, upvotes bigint)

routine.name: user_profile
routine.ResultsDefinition: TABLE(username character varying, email character varying, type character varying, created_at date, count_votes_rating_received integer, count_questions bigint, count_answers bigint, count_votes_made bigint)

routine.name: user_questions
routine.ResultsDefinition: TABLE(publicationid integer, title character varying, body text, solved_date timestamp without time zone, creation_date timestamp without time zone, last_edit_date timestamp without time zone, count_answers bigint)
